Our Comprehensive Training Programs:

1/4

Physical Training of Security Guards

Enhancing endurance, stamina, and overall fitness to maintain peak performance.
2/4

On-Site Training for Security

Tailoring skills to meet the specific requirements of deployment locations.
3/4

Fire Fighting, First Aid, and Life Safety Training

Equipping personnel to manage fire safety, and handle basic disaster management.
4/4

Reception and Administrative Skills Training

Preparing security for effective visitor interaction and emergency responses.
Faq
Need Assistance?

What types of security services do you offer?

We offer a wide range of security services including security guards, bouncers, bodyguards, escort guards, female security guards, dog squad services, event security, and tourist security. Our personnel are trained to handle various security situations professionally and efficiently.

What kind of training do your security personnel undergo?

Our security personnel undergo comprehensive training that includes physical fitness, classroom training, on-site training, and specialized training for fire fighting, first aid, and disaster management. We ensure that our staff is well-prepared to handle any situation with confidence.

Are your security guards trained in emergency response?

Yes, our security guards receive extensive training in emergency response, including fire fighting, first aid, and disaster management. They are equipped to handle emergencies and provide immediate assistance until professional help arrives.

Do you provide security for events?

Yes, we provide event security services. Our team is experienced in managing security for various types of events, ensuring the safety and security of all attendees and smooth event operations.

Can you provide female security guards?

Yes, we offer female security guards who are trained to handle various security tasks and provide a sense of security and comfort, especially in environments where female presence is preferred.

How do you ensure the quality and reliability of your services?

We maintain high standards of quality and reliability through rigorous training programs, regular performance evaluations, and continuous improvement initiatives. Our management team closely monitors all operations to ensure exceptional service delivery.

What are your rates for security services?

Our rates vary depending on the type, location and scope of services required. Please contact us directly for a detailed quote tailored to your specific needs.

Do you offer customized security solutions?

Yes, we provide customized security solutions tailored to the unique needs and requirements of our clients. We work closely with you to develop a security plan that addresses your specific concerns and objectives.

What areas do you serve?

We primarily serve Delhi-NCR , but we are also capable of providing services in other locations upon request. Please contact us to discuss your requirements.

How can I contact you for more information or to hire your services?

You can contact us via email at lakshay.multifacilities@gmail.com or call us at 8010445791. We are also available on WhatsApp at +91 8010445791. For more details, please visit Contact Us section

Do you provide facility management services?

Yes, in addition to security services, we also offer facility management services, including housekeeping, maintenance, pest control, horticulture, and engineering services. Our trained personnel ensure that your facilities are well-maintained and managed efficiently.

What makes your security services different from others?

Our security services stand out due to our commitment to comprehensive training, professionalism, and personalized service. We focus on building long-term relationships with our clients and continuously strive to exceed their expectations.
